price: Waɗanda suka kãfirta kuma suka kange mutãne daga tafarkin Allah, (Allah) Ya ɓatar da ayyukansu.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ أَضَلَّ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna kafarū waṣaddū ʿan sabīli al-lahi aḍalla aʿmālahum
translations: He will cause to be lost
